Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Four Pieces, op. 119

1893

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 15'

  • 1. Intermezzo in B minor
  • 2. Intermezzo in E minor
  • 3. Intermezzo in C major
  • 4. Rhapsodie in E-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/6 · HN 6014 · Klavierstücke · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Associated Board · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9631 · ed. Christian Köhn
  • Henle · HN 564 · Klavierstücke · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Henle · HN 565 · Klavierstücke · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Henle · HN 1250 · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Könemann · K 190 · Fantasien, Intermezzi und Klavierstücke · ed. Enikő Gyenge
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50045 · ed. Imogen Fellinger

1. Intermezzo in B minor

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Intermezzo in E minor

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3

3. Intermezzo in C major

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

4. Rhapsodie in E-flat major

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 4
